info.name: Fashion Shop API
info.description: Complete API collection for Fashion Shop Backend - A comprehensive e-commerce platform with product catalog, inventory, and order management.

item.name: Products
item.description: Product management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting products.

request.description: Retrieves all products from the catalog. Results are cached in Redis for 1 hour with 10-minute sliding expiration.
Retrieves a specific product by its ID. Returns 404 if product not found.
Creates a new product. SKU must be unique. Invalidates 'products_all' cache.
Updates an existing product. Returns 400 if ID mismatch, 204 on success. Invalidates both 'products_all' and 'product_{id}' cache.
Soft deletes a product (sets IsDeleted=true, DeletedAt=UTC_NOW). Product is excluded from future queries. Returns 204 on success.

item.name: Catalogs
item.description: Catalog management endpoints for organizing products into categories.

request.description: Retrieves all catalogs. Results are cached in Redis for 2 hours with 20-minute sliding expiration.
Retrieves a specific catalog by its ID. Returns 404 if catalog not found.
Creates a new catalog. Invalidates 'catalogs_all' cache.
Updates an existing catalog. Returns 400 if ID mismatch, 204 on success. Invalidates both 'catalogs_all' and 'catalog_{id}' cache.
Soft deletes a catalog (sets IsDeleted=true, DeletedAt=UTC_NOW). Catalog is excluded from future queries. Associated products remain unchanged. Returns 204 on success.

item.name: Orders
item.description: Order management endpoints for placing orders and retrieving order history.

request.description: Places a new order. Validates stock availability, calculates total amount, deducts inventory, and creates order with 'Pending' status. Either userId or guestId must be provided.
Places an order as a guest user. Uses guestId instead of userId for anonymous purchases.
Retrieves a specific order by its ID. Returns 404 if order not found.
Retrieves all orders for a specific user. Returns order history with all order details and items.

item.name: Inventory
item.description: Inventory management endpoints for stock control.

query.description: ID of the product to add stock for
Quantity to add (must be greater than 0)

request.description: Adds stock for a product. Creates inventory record if it doesn't exist, otherwise increments existing quantity. Updates LastUpdated timestamp.
